whoami.title: Who am I?
whoami.text:
Hello! My name is Adri√°n, but you can call me Adri, I am 29 years old and I am passionate about technology, video games and investigate deeply the topics that interest me.

I consider myself a very curious person who enjoys continuous learning and always likes to be updated on new technologies, especially in the world of web development.

work.title: Work Experience
work.text:
I have currently been working for 6 years at Aktios Digital Services, a technology consultancy with the position of Senior frontend developer. I have participated in several projects, among the most important an Ecommerce platform for clients such as Consum, Sorli, UVESCO, among others. I have also participated in web projects and mobile applications for automotive clients such as Audi, Volkswagen and Suzuki.

Previously, I worked for 1 year at Sener, an engineering company, on an internal web project on the management and calculations of train catenaries.

studies.title: Studies
studies.text:
Degree in Computer Engineering at the Autonomous University of Barcelona from 2012 to 2016

Certificate of Higher Education (HNC) on Computer System Administration Network (ASIX) at IES Sabadell from 2010 to 2012.

dummycoin.title: Dummycoin
dummycoin.info: Project based on blockchain technology which simulates the architecture of Bitcoin, it is a fully functional network with features such as mining blocks, creating transactions and generating wallets, it consists of a frontend part and a backend part.

postsboard.title: Posts Board
postsboard.info: Simple frontend project that implements functionalities like viewing, creating, editing and searching posts in a responsive board.
